author: Anton Petrov
description:

Hello and welcome! My name is Anton and in this video, we will talk about an interesting Chinese experiment involving a 100 year old quantum mechanics argument
Links:
https://journals.aps.org/prl/abstract/10.1103/93zb-lws3
https://arxiv.org/pdf/2410.10664

#einstein #physics  #quantumphysics 
Enjoy and please subscribe

0:00 Einstein's and Bohr's debate on quantum mechanics 
2:50 Experiment proposed by Einstein 
3:58 Bohr's response 
5:05 Experiment finally proves it and how it was done 
6:30 What this shows us and why this matt
title: Chinese Experiment Proves Einstein Wrong, Bohr Correct
